description: Try our easy to follow Peanut-Free Pumpkin Kernel & Sunflower Seed Butter recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Butter,Pescatarian,Roast,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Peanut-Free Pumpkin Kernel & Sunflower Seed Butter Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180Â°C. Place pumpkin kernels and sunflower seeds on a large tray. Roast in oven for 10 minutes or until lightly golden.
Combine warm kernels and seeds in a food processor and process for 1 minute or until very fine.
With the motor running, gradually add oil and process for 5 minutes, scraping down the side and bottom of bowl every minute. Add salt to taste.
Spoon mixture into a sterilised jar, seal and store in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.
